name: beCPG
tag_list: plm, food, cosmetics, cpg, formulation, software
overview:
beCPG is a Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) software that manages the entire lifecycle of a product from its conception, through design and manufacture, to service and disposal. beCPG permits you to work on your products and projects with customers and suppliers.

beCPG provides a PLM solution serving the industries of Consumer Packaged Goods (CPG) such as Food & Beverage and Cosmetics:

  • Product repository
  • Formula and recipe management
  • Reports / BI Light
  • Processes for managing projects (new product development, feasibility analysis, request for quotation, etc…)
